document.docAuthor: Shapovalov, Maksim I., Prokin, Alexandr A., Palatov, Dmitry M. & Kovalev, Alexey V.
document.masterDocTitle: Notes on the distribution and ecology of the genus Stenelmis Dufour, 1835 (Coleoptera: Elmidae) in the Caucasus

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Notes on the distribution and ecology of the genus Stenelmis Dufour, 1835 (Coleoptera: Elmidae) in the Caucasus

Habitats. 8 .
River, H ≈ 9.0 m, l = 0.1–0.4 m , v = 0.1–0.3 m /s, T = 21.5 °С; collected in current on lower surface of stones, in microcrevices;
9 .
River, H ≈ 12.0 m, l = 0.2 m , v = 0.2–0.5 m /s; collected on stones overgrown with filamentous algae, T = 21 ˚С;
20 .
River in the forest zone, H = 3.0–5.0 m, l = 0.15–0.3 m , v = 0.3–0.8 m /s, silted stones in the ripal zone.
22 .
River in the forest zone, H = 3.0–4.0 m, l = 0.15–0.3 m , v = 0.3–0.7 m /s, T = 15 °С, stones, pebbles, gravel.
23 .
Brook, H = 1.5 –2.0 m, l = 0.1–0.3 m , v = 0.2–0.7 m /s, Т = 14 °С, stones, pebbles, sand.
25 .
River in deep canyon-like valley, H = 3.0–4.0 m, v = 0.1 –07 m/s, large stones overgrown with filamentous algae.
28 .
River in deep forest valley, H = 1.5–2.5 m , l = 0.1–0.2 m , v = 0.2–0.8 m /s., prevailing substrate: stones without overgrowth, silt accumulations under bank.
31 .
Brook, S = 0.7–1.2 m , l = 0.05–0.15 m , v = 0.1–0.4 m /s, pebbles, detritus, litter, overgrowth.
32 .
River, H = 3.0–5.0 m, l = 0.2–0.5 m , v = 0.5–1.2 m /s, T = 15 °С, stones, in places pebbles, sand, litter.
33 .
River, H = 4.0–7.0 m, l = 0.2–0.5 m , v = 0.6–1.2 m /s, T = 12 °С, large stones with abundant overgrowth.
34 .
Coastal part of river, shaded with shrubs and trees, S = 3.0–4.0 m, l = 0.2–0.4 m , v = 0.6– 1.2 m /s, Т = 16 °С, stones, pebbles.
Recorded for the first time in Krasnodar Krai and, possibly, Armenia .
